name: Good Foot Delivery Shipping Integration
author: sagesolutionsinc

sections.description:
A Good Foot Delivery integration for WooCommerce, including real-time shipping rates, order fulfillment processing, and live tracking updates.

Short Description

A Good Foot Delivery integration for WooCommerce, including real-time shipping rates, order fulfillment processing, and live tracking updates.

Environments

  1. Production – connects with https://api.goodfootdelivery.com/ to integrate with live data
  2. Sandbox – connects with https://testapi.goodfootdelivery.com/ to integrate with test data
  3. Development – connects with https://appserver_nginx.gfdapi.internal/ – used for plugin development only.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire ‘goodfootdelivery’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Sign up with Good Foot Delivery to receive your API credentials.
  4. Enter your credentials on the Good Foot Delivery tab of the WooCommerce Settings page at /wp-admin/admin.php?page=wc-settings&tab=goodfootdelivery&section=settings and select your environment. See environment options below. Click Save to continue.
  5. Once settings are saved, click the Connect link /wp-admin/admin.php?page=wc-settings&tab=goodfootdelivery&section=connect to complete the integration.

short_description: A Good Foot Delivery integration for WooCommerce, including real-time shipping rates, order fulfillment processing, and live tracking updates.
